name: Disconnected Demo Level
description:
You awakened inside a mysterious place with no recollection of how you got there or where you are. You must find a way out or be trapped there forever.

***Controls:

WASD: Move player

Space: Jump

Esc: Pause game

A short demo demonstrating level design using Unreal Engine 4. All assets used are from Epic Games' Quixel Megascans library.
